comments.comment:
It seems only support the limited types, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/sql-machine-learning/gohive/blob/a5791c2ac7fddcbfcaed7137f66b32839ae2ea78/rows.go#L112>https://github.com/sql-machine-learning/gohive/blob/a5791c2ac7fddcbfcaed7137f66b32839ae2ea78/rows.go#L112</denchmark-link>
I will add decimal type in gohive.
